dfischer.utils

Class BoundaryBasedExtractorItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.BoundaryBasedExtractorItem

  • public class BoundaryBasedExtractorItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the configured left and right boundaries and also the extracted result text.
    Since:
    V5.4-K

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundaryBasedExtractorItem(java.lang.String leftBoundary, java.lang.String rightBoundary, int ordinalNumber, boolean randomExtraction, boolean occurrencePosFromVariable, int occurrencePosVariableValue, boolean counterVar)
      Create a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getOccurrencePosVariableValue()
      Returns the value of the Occurrence Position Variable if occurrencePosFromVariable is true.
      int getOrdinalNumber()
      Returns the value of the number of occurrences.
      int getResultLineNumber()
      Returns the absolute line number where the text has been extracted.
      java.lang.String getResultText()
      Returns the value of the extracted token (variable).
      java.lang.String getSearchPattern()
      Returns the regex pattern created out of left and right boundary.
      boolean isCounterVar()
      Return true if the occurrence position variable selected is a loop or user counter
      boolean isOccurrencePosFromVariable()
      Returns flag which states Occurrence position to be used by the value of a variable or not.
      boolean isRandomExtraction()
      Returns the value of the random extraction activate flag for the multiple matches.
      void setResultText(java.lang.String resultText)
      Set the result of the extraction

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundaryBasedExtractorItem

        public BoundaryBasedExtractorItem(java.lang.String leftBoundary,
                          java.lang.String rightBoundary,
                          int ordinalNumber,
                          boolean randomExtraction,
                          boolean occurrencePosFromVariable,
                          int occurrencePosVariableValue,
                          boolean counterVar)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        leftBoundary - the left boundary text for extraction
        rightBoundary - the right boundary text for extraction
        ordinalNumber - the number of occurrence
        randomExtraction - the value of the random extraction activate flag for the multiple matches
        occurrencePosFromVariable - flag which states Occurrence position to be used by the value of a variable or not
        occurrencePosVariableValue - the value of the variable used as the occurrence position
        counterVar - flag which indicates the occurrence position variable selected is a loop or user counter

    • Method Detail

      • getResultText

        public java.lang.String getResultText()
        Returns the value of the extracted token (variable).
        Returns:
        the value of the extracted text or null if no result (no text) is available.

      • getResultLineNumber

        public int getResultLineNumber()
        Returns the absolute line number where the text has been extracted.
        Returns:
        the absolute line number (0..n-1) where the text has been extracted or -1 if no text has been extracted.
